key.name: window-maximized
key.summary: Whether the window was maximized on last run
key.description: Whether the window was maximized on last run

key.name: mapping-override
key.summary: Override (and extends) the default mapping with plugs
key.description: Contains a dictionary of path and two strings: the plug name and an argument. For example {'wallpaper': ('foo-desktop','wallpaper'), 'display': ('bar-display','')}
